The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We are currently busy planning facility improvements, classroom resources and finalising recruitment for next acedemic year, 2013/14. As we do each year at this time, we would like to ask you to help us by providing as much notice as possible of your intention to leave or remain at BSG next year.
We would also like to remind families who do plan to leave us that the return of any refundable student placement deposits held by the school or payment of ‘Early Notice Payback’, if this is aplicable to your family, is conditional on the school receiving a minimum of three months written notice of withdrawal prior to the last day of school attendance.
If your intention is to leave at the end of this academic year, notification should be received by our Admissions team before Thursday, March 28th 2013 to be eligible for any deposit refund or early notice payment. If you require more information on refundable student deposits or ‘Early Notice Payback’, please contact Irene@bsg.org.cn or admissions@bsg.org.cn.
With this in mind, we would very much appreciate your support by returning the slip below in an envelope marked to the attention of Admissions or by email to admissions@bsg.org.cn, no later than Thursday, 28th March 2013. A ‘Leavers Form’ will then be sent to any families who do not require a place with us next year and the best possible planning can be put into place for those students returning to school in August 2013.
Thank you in advance for your cooperation as we prepare thouroughly for next acedemic year.
